name: Forsake
description:
Forsake is a 1 to 4 co-op online psychological horror game where each player is a member of an urban explorers group.
Enter off limits places full of paranormal activities to discover their darkest secrets at the risk of your life.

1 - Create your exploration team

Invite up to 3 other people to form your urbex group and explore abandoned places with many mysteries.


2 - Choose your weapon and equipment

Prepare for each expedition by choosing weapons and equipments to explore abandoned places where evil entities roam!


3 - Explore, Loot, Survive

Explore the locations and unlock areas by finding hidden keys or codes. Collect items and equipment to upgrade your arsenal and earn money.
Watch out for yourself and your friends, the paranormal entities that haunt the place will be your worst nightmare.
Escape whenever you want to return to your base with your loot. Only survivors will be rewarded.


4 - Upgrade your equipment and unlock new areas to explore

With equipment recovered and items sold after your exploration, upgrade your arsenal and unlock new unique weapons and equipment!
Equip them at the start of the next exploration and access even more challenging areas haunted by ever more demonic entities.

Key Features:


- An immersive experience: with realistic graphics and sound design, Forsake offers a unique and immersive psychological horror experience
- Solo, co-op or PvP experience: You can explore alone or up to 4 players. If your squad is not complete, an unknown player can join your group. Will this stranger be friendly, or will he try to harm you to get all the loot?
- Paranormal entities with unique behaviors: each entity has a unique behavior with personal characteristics. Get to know their specificities to better face them.
- Close voice chat: use the in-game voice chat to speak with your friends. Don't get too far from them, or you may find yourself alone with a terrifying creature.
- Your gameplay, your experience: you are armed and can confront spirits to make them flee. But you can also play it stealthy by avoiding confrontation.

Upcoming features:


- Customized events: thanks to a behavior learning and analysis system, unique events will start according to the player habits. It will sure scare the bravest of you.
- Accessibility for the visually impaired: in line with Unseen Interactive's commitment, Forsake will eventually be accessible to the visually impaired.
- VR version: for a perfect horrific experience, a VR version will be developed... We know this will make your blood run cold.
- Skill tree: you will be able to choose from several branches to get unique skills. Will you be strong, fast, or technical?
